TITLE: Martin's Card Extractor
CREATOR: Martin Gonzalvez
DESCRIPTION: A free web app to extract individual card images from PnP PDF files by drawing grids along the cutting guides.

TITLE: Martin's Card Formatter
CREATOR: Martin Gonzalvez
DESCRIPTION: A free web app to upload individual card images and lay them out as properly formatted PnP PDF files.

TITLE: PnP Launchpad
CREATOR: Martin Gonzalvez
DESCRIPTION: A website to keep track of current and upcoming PnP crowdfunding projects and promotions.

TITLE: PnPFinder
CREATOR: Martin Gonzalvez
DESCRIPTION: A community-curated website to search for and discover worthwhile PnP games.
